name: DailyEmpoweringPositiveAffirmationsforPlurals
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Daily, short empowering affirmations and system check in reminders, for people living with dissociative identity disorder, Other Specified Dissociative Disorder and all other forms of plurality and multiplicity. 

Hello and welcome to this short introduction of this new daily 30 seconds podcast. We are the Stronghold System, founders of the plural association, a grassroot registered nonprofit, we live with dissociative identity disorder and also self I'd as plural. Everyday we will bring you an empowering positive affirmation and a system check in reminder for you and your system. You find these on all major podcast distributors and on the flash briefing by Alexa. 

You can listen to these whenever you want. Everyday a new episode is released. This service is offered to you by The Plural Association, the first grassroot, registered nonprofit for people living with dissociative identity disorder and all other forms of Plurality. Visit our website thepluralassociation.org for more information. We hope you enjoy these daily empowering affirmations. And as always power to the plurals.

These daily affirmations are brought to you by The Plural Association! The Plural Association is the first grassroots, registered nonprofit, we support people with Dissociative Identity Disorder and all other forms of Plurality worldwide. We are not government or grant funded. We depend fully on community and ally support. 

Thank you so very much, without your support our work would not be possible.
For more information, please visit https://thepluralassociation.org/ 
Empowering articles and resources: https://powertotheplurals.com/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
